post:
openvz
256MB RAM
512MB burst
10 GB disk
350 GB bandwidth
DALLAS TX
$15/year

it is still active till Dec. 30, 2011.
I'll cancel it, but was thinking that maybe someone is interested it taking it over.
Just make an offer if you want it within next 24 hours, afterwards I'll decide to whom it will be transferred.
